overview: Amira Adara has agreed to pose partly naked for her girlfriend Merry Pie, who wants to practice her figure painting. • Early in the morning, Lily Adams wakes to find herself spooned around Alexa Grace. • Haily Sanders and her girlfriend Lady D. are hanging out on the bed as they help each other with their beauty routines. • Elsa Jean and Emma Hix have decided to spend the afternoon in bed as they explore new ways to pleasure each other's super skinny bodies.
title: Erotic Art
